definition: a block in the (approximate) shape of a cube, to raise to the third power
details:
noun
- a block in the (approximate) shape of a cube
= synonyms: square block
- any of several tropical American woody plants of the genus Lonchocarpus whose roots are used locally as a fish poison and commercially as a source of rotenone
- the product of three equal terms
= synonyms: third power
- a three-dimensional shape with six square or rectangular sides
= synonyms: block
- a hexahedron with six equal squares as faces
= synonyms: regular hexahedron
verb
- to raise to the third power
- to cut into cubes
= example: to cut into cubes
= synonyms: dice
